name: Center Your Practice with Amy Valdez
description:
We hear about the core all the time but what exactly is the core?  In this interactive workshop‬ we will the muscles that make up the core and how to activate them.  

The first half of class will‬ be a step by step engagement of the core through Pilates based exercises to help you learn to‬ connect to your core on and off the mat.  After a brief break we will resume our exploration of ‬your center by applying core activation to yoga sequences for a full and centered practice.‬

This workshop is for yoga students of all levels.

name: Mala Bead Workshop
description:
Saturday, September 21st 12-2pm

Mala beads act as reminders and catalysts for living our intention.

Mala beads are meditation garlands that have been used for thousands of years in traditions of yoga and meditation as well as a variety of different religions. The common thread is that mala beads or “malas”, are tactile reminders that reminds us to breathe, bring ourselves back from the busy and crazy lives we live and bring us into the moment. Mala's are both beatiful and a great tool to help with meditation. Learn more about mala beads and make your own in this workshop. We will also do some yoga and meditation. 

Cost $50 (Includes supplies and light refreshments)

name: Prenatal-Partner Yoga Class
description: This workshop is a fun, relaxed class that will allow you to engage with your partner in a supportive physical practice.  We will address postures, massage and breathing techniques. This is a great workshop to help prepare for the journey into parenthood.  No yoga experience is required.

name: Kids Summer Yoga 6-Week Series
description:
Ages 5-10
Thursdays, June 12-July 25 (no class 7/4)
4-5pm. $80

This workshop incorporates asana (postures) with games, music and meditation to build confidence, balance, coordination and create a sense of calm. Allowing kids to have fun, while learning tools that they can use to deal with everyday life.

Please visit unfoldyogaOC.com to confirm days and times. 

Pre-registration is required.
